messages.message:
Hi team, seeing an extremely weird behaviour in my crafting env: https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/yash?cw=dev
where some files are automatically getting deleted
```FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks/build/pythriftdeps.txt'```
For some weird reason, `pythriftdeps.txt` instantly gets deleted from the build directory for any service. For example, in celery-app-tasks:
```➜  app-tasks git:(master) ✗ pwd
/home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks
➜  app-tasks git:(master) ✗ touch build/pythriftdeps.txt && ls build
py  pydeps.txt  pythriftdeps.txt
➜  app-tasks git:(master) ✗ ls build
py  pydeps.txt```
This is blocking most of the python services from building.. :melting_face:
